page.title: 15ENERGY SOURCES IN MIDHURST.
page.content: There is no electricity power station. The supply comes in on power lines carried overhead on huge pylons.The whole area has access to the main supply but suffers from frequent,sometimes lengthy cuts when high winds or lightning damage the lines. Gas mains have been laid in most of Midhurst.The extension of the mains to the rest of Midhurst is now under discussion.Easebourne is on the mains but there are no plans to take gas to the rest of the area. There is oil underground and surveys have taken place.Public opinion is strongly opposed to drilling and the quality and quantity of oil so far struck have not been good enough for commercial development.Local surveying has stopped at present.
